translations: n.[经]萧条（depression 的复数形式）；按下；抑制；[内科]抑郁症

phrs.translation: 大萧条（美国经济大萧条时期）

sentences.sentence: For milder depressions, certain forms of psychotherapy do work well.
sentences.translation: 对于比较轻微的抑郁症，某些形式的心理疗法确实很有效。

sentences.sentence: In the last few decades of the 20th century, living standards went up and economic depressions were largely averted in the US.
sentences.translation: 在20世纪的最后几十年里，美国的生活水平提高了，经济萧条在很大程度上得以避免。

sentences.sentence: It lays its eggs in shallow depressions in the sand with very little protection around them.
sentences.translation: 它把蛋产在沙中的浅洼地里，周围几乎没有保护措施。
